description: Show the full details of a time card invoice.
permissions: Requires an authenticated user with access to the related invoice via InvoicePolicy scope. Admins can view all; non-admins are limited to invoices where they are a member of the buyer customer (including management-service-type customer visibility), a manager member of the seller trucker, or a member of the broker.
validation_notes: id argument is required and must be non-empty.
